headline: Aquele Abra√ßo Rio de Janeiro: Cloudflare's 116th Data Center!
keywords: Cloudflare Network, Data Center, Brazil, Latin America, South America
description: Cloudflare is excited to announce our newest data center in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. This is our eighth data center in South America, and expands the Cloudflare network to 116 cities across 57 countries.
